data.title: Ginny Ann Gibson
data.text:
Ginny Ann Gibson, 69, of Murrayville, GA, passed away Wednesday April 10, 2013.

The daughter of the late William Earl and Annie Geneva Ellis Abercrombie, Ginny was a homemaker all of her life and a Christian who had an amazing walk with the Lord.

She is preceded in death by her husband, James Lonnie Gibson; brother, Eddie Abercrombie; and sister, Joyce Robinson.

She is survived by her son and daughter-in-law, William and Stephanie Gibson, Murrayville, GA; daughter, Kelly Gibson, Gainesville, GA; daughters and sons-in-law, Jamie and Mark Payne, Murrayville, GA, Mandie and Chris Kidd, Gainesville, GA; sisters and brothers-in-law, Betty and Bobby Lee, Dahlonega, GA, Georgia and Danny McDonald, Murrayville, GA; grandchildren, Hannah, Chase, Collen, Milea, Carson, and Hayden Kidd, Noah and Bethany Jackson, and Kassidy Payne.

Funeral services for Ginny are scheduled for 2 PM Saturday, April 13, 2013 at the Banister Funeral Home Chapel in Dahlonega, GA.

Rev. Bernice Collins and Rev. Brian Johnson will officiate.

Interment will follow in the Oak Grove Baptist Church Cemetery in Lumpkin County.

The family will receive friends at Banister Funeral Home in Dahlonega from 5 PM until 9 PM Thursday, April 11, from 5 PM until 9 PM Friday, April 12, and from 11 AM until service time on Saturday, April 13.

Online condolences may be made at www.banisterfuneralhome.net.

Banister Funeral Home of Dahlonega is in charge of the arrangements.
